title: Blazor Client (webassembly) Facebook or Google login
body:
I know it isn't a specific issue, but can you give me any guideline how to create Facebook or Google login for Blazor Client (Webassembly) app? I emphasize Client (so not Server!) because it is exist and working well.

Or just tell me that it is possible? And need I use the server (asp.net core web api) or the client would be enough itself?

I appreciate any hint.
